events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit properly and I am unhappy with the size.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund requests based on the customer's message mentioning refund and dissatisfaction.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request and make this process as smooth as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you better?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The jacket runs smaller than the size chart indicated, and unfortunately I cannot exchange it due to unavailability.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund which should be credited to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help with the refund and this solution works perfectly for me.
I’m glad to hear that. Your refund case is now closed on our end. Please contact us if you have any further issues.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ensure everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
Since no further concerns were reported after our follow-up, this case is now officially closed. Thank you for your patience.
